This code contains all of the steps necessary to clean and analyze Growth Mortality data
 
# Cleaning
```{r cleaning, message = F, warning = F}
library(knitr)
setwd("~/Shrubs-Seedlings/code/GrowthMortality_Analysis//")
strt <- Sys.time()
rmarkdown::render("Clean_all.Rmd", "html_document")
rmarkdown::render("Clean_vert.Rmd", "html_document")
rmarkdown::render("dendro_join.Rmd", "html_document")
rmarkdown::render("Clean_dendro.Rmd", "html_document")

print(Sys.time()-strt)
```
